verses.kjv: The word of the LORD that came unto Hosea, the son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
verses.web: LORD’s word that came to Hosea the son of Beeri, in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam the son of Joash, king of Israel.
verses.ct: This is the word of the LORD that came to Hosea son of Beeri during the reigns of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and during the reign of Jeroboam son of Joash, king of Israel.

verses.kjv: The beginning of the word of the LORD by Hosea. And the LORD said to Hosea, Go, take unto thee a wife of whoredoms and children of whoredoms: for the land hath committed great whoredom, departing from the LORD.
verses.web: When LORD spoke at first by Hosea, LORD said to Hosea, “Go, take for yourself a wife of prostitution and children of unfaithfulness; for the land commits great adultery, forsaking LORD.”
verses.ct: When the LORD first spoke through Hosea, he told him, "Go and marry a woman known for prostitution, and have children with her — because this land has been unfaithful to the LORD, committing terrible adultery by turning away from him."

verses.kjv: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim; which conceived, and bare him a son.
verses.web: So he went and took Gomer the daughter of Diblaim; and she conceived, and bore him a son.
verses.ct: So Hosea married Gomer, the daughter of Diblaim. She became pregnant and gave him a son.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto him, Call his name Jezreel; for yet a little while, and I will avenge the blood of Jezreel upon the house of Jehu, and will cause to cease the kingdom of the house of Israel.
verses.web: LORD said to him, “Call his name Jezreel; for yet a little while, and I will avenge the blood of Jezreel on the house of Jehu, and will cause the kingdom of the house of Israel to cease.
verses.ct: The LORD told him, "Name him Jezreel, because very soon I will punish the house of Jehu for the bloodshed at Jezreel, and I will bring the kingdom of Israel to an end."

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass at that day, that I will break the bow of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.
verses.web: It will happen in that day that I will break the bow of Israel in the valley of Jezreel.”
verses.ct: "When that day comes, I will shatter Israel's military power in the valley of Jezreel."

verses.kjv: And she conceived again, and bare a daughter. And God said unto him, Call her name Loruhamah: for I will no more have mercy upon the house of Israel; but I will utterly take them away.
verses.web: She conceived again, and bore a daughter. Then he said to him, “Call her name Lo-Ruhamah; for I will no longer have mercy on the house of Israel, that I should in any way pardon them.
verses.ct: Gomer became pregnant again and gave birth to a daughter. God told Hosea, "Name her Lo-Ruhamah, because I will no longer show mercy to the house of Israel. I will completely take them away."

verses.kjv: But I will have mercy upon the house of Judah, and will save them by the LORD their God, and will not save them by bow, nor by sword, nor by battle, by horses, nor by horsemen.
verses.web: But I will have mercy on the house of Judah, and will save them by LORD their God, and will not save them by bow, sword, battle, horses, or horsemen.”
verses.ct: "But I will show mercy to the house of Judah. I will save them — not through bows, swords, battles, horses, or horsemen — but through the LORD their God himself."

verses.kjv: Now when she had weaned Loruhamah, she conceived, and bare a son.
verses.web: Now when she had weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she conceived, and bore a son.
verses.ct: After Gomer had weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she became pregnant again and gave birth to a son.

verses.kjv: Then said God, Call his name Loammi: for ye are not my people, and I will not be your God.
verses.web: He said, “Call his name Lo-Ammi; for you are not my people, and I will not be yours.
verses.ct: God said, "Name him Lo-Ammi, because you are not my people, and I will not be your God."

verses.kjv: Yet the number of the children of Israel shall be as the sand of the sea, which cannot be measured nor numbered; and it shall come to pass, that in the place where it was said unto them, Ye are not my people, there it shall be said unto them, Ye are the sons of the living God.
verses.web: Yet the number of the children of Israel will be as the sand of the sea, which can’t be measured or counted; and it will come to pass that, in the place where it was said to them, ‘You are not my people,’ they will be called ‘sons of the living God.’
verses.ct: "Yet the day will come when the people of Israel will be as countless as the sand on the seashore — impossible to measure or number. In the very place where they were told, 'You are not my people,' they will be called 'sons of the living God.'"

verses.kjv: Then shall the children of Judah and the children of Israel be gathered together, and appoint themselves one head, and they shall come up out of the land: for great shall be the day of Jezreel.
verses.web: The children of Judah and the children of Israel will be gathered together, and they will appoint themselves one head, and will go up from the land; for great will be the day of Jezreel.
verses.ct: The people of Judah and the people of Israel will be reunited under one leader, and they will rise up from the land together. What a great day Jezreel will be!
